        Toggles on/off the area visibility for the player
        Parameters:
        player - the player
        Returns:
        the new status of area visibility for the player

      • getPlayerPermissions

        public static long getPlayerPermissions(net.risingworld.api.objects.Player player)
        Returns the current area permissions for the player
        Parameters:
        player - the player
        Returns:
        the player permissions for the areas he is currently in or all permissions, if he is currently in no area

      • getPresetPermissionsFromName

        public static long getPresetPermissionsFromName(java.lang.String name)
        Retrieves the permissions associated with a preset given the preset name.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of preset
        Returns:
        the preset permissions or 0 if such a preset does not exists.

      • getPresetNameFromPermissions

        public static java.lang.String getPresetNameFromPermissions(long perms)
        Returns the name of the first listed preset whose permissions match a given permission set.
        Parameters:
        perms - the permission to match
        Returns:
        the name of the first found group matching the permissions or "Custom if no group matching group is found.

      • areaIntersects

        public static boolean areaIntersects(net.risingworld.api.utils.Area areaA,
                                     net.risingworld.api.utils.Area areaB)
        Returns true if areaA and areaB intersect or false otherwise.

        Needed to circumvent a bug in Area.intersect(Area).

        Parameters:
        areaA - one area
        areaB - another area
        Returns:
        true if areaA and areaB intersect, false if they do not.

      • getAreaCentre

        public static java.lang.String getAreaCentre(net.risingworld.api.utils.Area rwArea)
        Returns the 3D coordinates of the centre of an RW area as a String.
        Parameters:
        rwArea - the area for which to retrieve the centre.
        Returns:
        a String describing the area centre.

      • getAreaSpans

        public static java.lang.String getAreaSpans(net.risingworld.api.utils.Area rwArea)
        Returns the 3D span of an RW area as a String.
        Parameters:
        rwArea - the area for which to retrieve the spans.
        Returns:
        a String describing the area spans.
